name: Mba Sischa
greetingText: I really like your voice & the way you smile, btw!
wishText: I wish you're enjoying your special day yah! ;)
textInChatBox: Yaumul milad Mba Sischa, barakallah fii umrik blah.. blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text6Content: That's why I made this website for you
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click this, kalau kamu mau lihat dari awal lagi.
